ComicInfo.Summary:
Dinah's life on the run begins in this issue as she hitches a ride with a young man, tells him her story, only to be blackmailed by him afterward to give her all her money ($200) so that he won't tell the authorities about her. This leaves her with very little money and she begins to beg for it but this doesn't work very well. Eventually she needs a hotel and comes to the owner but only has $10, so she pays by sating his sexual hungers, gaining enough money to find better lodgings. At the hotel she notices a cut on her hand and finds herself witness to the lovemaking of two women, which causes her in turn to take advantage of the room service employee to satisfy her own desires. After all is said and done she realizes she doesn't even know who she is anymore, and begins to wonder what is happening, believing that perhaps the cut is at fault.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:02:05. [CVDB149948]
